description: Returns progress information for the current change happening on an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline. Currently, this operation only returns information when a pipeline is being created. For more information, see Tracking the status of pipeline creation.

nested_items.name: ChangeProgressStatuses
nested_items.description: The current status of the change happening on the pipeline.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the configuration change is made on the pipeline.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The overall status of the pipeline configuration change.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfStages
nested_items.description: The total number of stages required for the pipeline configuration change.

nested_items.name: ChangeProgressStages
nested_items.description: Information about the stages that the pipeline is going through to perform the configuration change.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the stage that the change is in.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The most recent updated timestamp of the stage.
